description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>For Demacia!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavorText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian Ensign
name: Vanguard Sergeant
